website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice if you're looking to add a water element but have more creativity than money.
pros: Comes with a pump, tubing, and the bamboo assembly (but no bowl)
Well made at a low price
Providing your own bowl gives you a ton of options in terms of overall look
cons: Does not come with a bowl
A few reports of the bamboo element leaking

customer_reviews.title: Simple setup and works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small Japanese garden setting in one corner of my backyard. and wanted to add a water feature there. I bought a planter from TJ Maxx for 14.99 (what would I do without them!) and put this fountain kit on top. I also plugged this to a timer so it runs from around 6:30 AM and stops at midnight. It's been running regularly without a problem since I set it up. I cleaned the pump once. Water shouldn't be too full so you can hear the sound of water trickling in and the sound of it also reverb from the bowl itself. It looks and sounds very relaxing. It's a very simple setup but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Great White Chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far, the product is great. Planning a table for church's "festival of tables" and will be using it as a centerpiece for theme of "living water... thirst no more" (John 4:13-14). Fits nicely on top of an old barn bucket, secured to handle using rubber bands. Sound is lovely! The connection into the pump is a bit loose but I don't anticipate it moving enough to come undone. I didn't want to spend a lot and using my own bucket kept my cost low.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Picture misleading. Water is leaking out because joining with tube is very short.
customer_reviews.text: I have this thing for couple month and now decided to wright a review. But when I saw the price I paid again - I’ve got frustrated. I thought I paid like $15 or so. Anyway, this fountain is just a piece of wood ( picture is misleading) plus the tip which connects the tube from pump to this piece of bamboo is so short, so it always falling off or leaking along the wood. Once whole bowl leaked out on the carpet so I had to remove whole carpet lining to dry to prevent mold. For $40 they could make at least 1 inch longer tip to prevent leakage. I’m disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Sergii Sakhno

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fountain
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is just amazing. It is very easy to set up. I ordered twice because the first one was cracked and leaking badly (so check your bamboo tube before you turn it on - even a tiny crack leads to big flood when you add water). The second one is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: andanteusa

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Bamboo cracked and leaked
customer_reviews.text: This fountain was beautiful for about three months until the spout cracked a huge crack along the whole length of it and leaked. I use it indoors so the leak was not good, had to stop using it. I tried filling the leak with some marine adhesive but that just made the crack worse after I turned it back on. Had to end up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: pscave

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bamboo Fountain!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my bamboo fountain! It gives me a zen feeling and I love to hear the water. I purchased a ceramic pot and plant stand, got a couple of rocks and voila! It is a lovely addition to my rooftop garden. I did not know until I received the fountain that there are 2 or 3 ways to configure the fountain - very cool! (We have had a lot of rain this week, so my pot is pretty full and dirty. It makes more noise the farther the water falls to the pool.)
customer_reviews.author: Peggykin

customer_reviews.title: Kit Not Complete
customer_reviews.text: I received the product without the required tubing to connect the pump and the spout. I called the company and they said it should have been included, but was not. They were willing to send me the tubing, but that's no help to me, because it's a birthday present that I planned to give today. Also, please note that the bamboo spout should not be used unless you all buy a protective spray to cover it so the bamboo doesn't rot with constant exposure to water. Really not pleased that I received something that is missing parts and that needs additional work to avoid a degraded product.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo cracked ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in January, but just got it set up three days ago. I love the look of it, however the top bamboo piece where the water comes out already has a big crack in it. It’s on the top so doesn’t affect the water flow....but doesn’t look good! Also, be aware the pump is tiny...not much of a water flow.
customer_reviews.author: barbara c

customer_reviews.title: Wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have looked at the dimensions, but this is much wider than I expected, so I had to move plants around and fortunately I have a wide enough pot for this. And then I noticed that the water was disappearing faster than normal and I thought I had a leak. No leak. But when set flat, the water was spilling on to the bamboo and dripped to the side. I had to put stones under the bamboos to tilt it so that the water would flow out without without any spills. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: PCD

customer_reviews.title: No Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I felt like the photo was deceiving. It did not come with the green bowl as depicted. For the price I feel like I could have gotten a complete set without having to go shop for a bowl now. The whole purpose of me ordering it here was to avoid more shopping but now I gel like I just have another errand to run.
customer_reviews.author: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and now time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful and is perfect for the zen look I was going for. My 11 year old set it up all by herself in less than 10 minutes. So it is super easy to set up. If you want a loud water trickling sound then I suppose either use a deeper bowl or a diff fountain. This water sound is very soft but you can hear it if your area is quiet. I am planning to seal it after reading so many reviews on cracking etc. Hoping it'll last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Pump will not start after turned off.
customer_reviews.text: Pump was plugged into an extension cord that was plugged into an outdoor light socket so it could be easily turned off at night. This worked for a few weeks and was turned off when we left on vacation. When we returned from vacation and turned on pump, it would not start. After emptying the bowl, removing the pump, and turning the switch on and off, the pump started. From that point on, the pump would not start after being turned off at night. Our vacation return was beyond the return date so we're stuck with a pump and fountain that does not work. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: James D Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful But Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Pump works well and the bamboo spout is beautiful. In order to get the sound of water babbling like a brook you need to make sure there is a good drop from the spout to the water level. At first I filled my fountain bowl and could hear almost nothing - I was quite disappointed. But, when I lowered the water level the sound increased. The sound is gentle, but pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use...lovely and Zen
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th purchase and every fountain I have made from the kits turned out GREAT! Very easy to use. I turned an old copper container into a zen fountain; we dug a pond and used one there and I made an old planter with no drainage into a lovely fountain. I think you can use indoors too. The customer service was great when I had a small issue with one of the pumps. Got back to me right away even on a holiday weekend!! Very pleased with the quality and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: MusicTech

customer_reviews.title: Beauriful and what I wanted BUUUUUT...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, easy to assemble, and what I was looking for....however when the instructions say it can accommodate up to 20 inches that is not true. The span is only about 13 inches. If you have a container that is 20 inches in diameter it will NOT fit. Also, as many have said, after three days, there is a crack. It does not effect the functioning but still....disappointing. Not sure I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MesquiteCreekRanch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! After reading some reviews about it cracking and getting moldy, I made sure to spray it with polyurethane before use and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: LMT

customer_reviews.title: Well made and not cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Some bamboo fountain kits use bamboo the doesn't look well finished. This one does. Comes with a relatively small pump but it seems to be adequate and do the job in a pot as shown. Pump has a tiny switch on the front of it to regulate flow. Makes a nice noise to add to the tranquility of a garden or a special spot in your home. Changing the water frequently before it gets nasty helps keep the little pump clean, but it's worth it. I don't add anything to the water because my bird friends like to drink out of it. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: P. Aynesworth

customer_reviews.title: I put the spout on a beautiful red bowl and on top of the spout I ...
customer_reviews.text: This spout was just what I needed in my living room. I put the spout on a beautiful red bowl and on top of the spout I placed a crystal, the energy in the room has totally changed and I look forward in the morning to listen to it. I do not turn it off (it runs constantly) because of the beautiful sound that comes from the spout. I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Boor

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing water fountain
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very quickly and is just what we wanted. It was very easy to assemble and had it working in 5 minutes. It did not come with the tubing, but luckily we had some on hand and just cut it to size and works great. The pump is very small, but seems to work fine. It looks great in our small water pond and has the soft relaxing water flow we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Loving on the third floor I wanted an easy to clean fountain and bird bath. The fountain is perfect bought a planter (which has a hole In the bottom) so I placed a glass bowl Inside. Easy clean and set up. Bamboo is loving it as well. Birds visit and I enjoy the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Squirt Dudgeon

customer_reviews.title: excellent. Very easy to put it to work and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to buy a fountain and I found this here on amazon and start getting all the other stuff I needed. The result: excellent. Very easy to put it to work and so beautiful. The price is the best, I save a lot of money considering the prices of the fountains.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and a good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, just attach the hose. I've had 4 indoor water features but never had one that you can adjust the sound. A large deep pot resonates loudly and a shallow bowl is quiet. I'm enjoying how versatile it is. It looks good. Local stores sell similar kits for $20 more than on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGeek

customer_reviews.title: Very well made fountain
customer_reviews.text: I use this fountain in a large pot water feature in my front garden. I've used many fountains of this variety and this one it well made and works quite well. Everything is included so it can be installed right out of the box in minutes. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dobeck

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I sprayed the bamboo with a clear weather-proofing ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I sprayed the bamboo with a clear weather-proofing coating so it'll look good for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Developed giant crack after less than one day of use!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this fountain except that after using it for only one day it has developed a crack (see photos) that appears to be getting larger as time goes on. I just got it and now I’m worried as the crack is expanding. I’ve had it for less than 2 days and the crack wasn’t there when I set it up!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great patio addition
customer_reviews.text: Made a great birdbath on my patio which has attracted many more birds to my feeders. I’m sure it’s the sound of the water this thing makes. Like others, I did spray with a waterproofing finish to hopefully prolong its use. It is certainly peaceful!
customer_reviews.author: blacam

customer_reviews.title: Pre owned version was missing pump
customer_reviews.text: Even though it said "checked for quality", my warehouse purchase was missing the pump. I returned it and decided not to go with this product based on the reviews regarding mold. My purpose for this was to add to my vivarium. I can't have my bearded dragon getting respiratory disease or something else from mold.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Make your own fountain with ease & fun.
customer_reviews.text: Make your own indoor OR outdoor fountain?! Yeah! Love this idea. BUT, do make sure you order EXACTLY which of the configurations you want. For me, this worked best. Easy-peasy. Love the gentle sound. Good feng shui.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Toth

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN after only a month and a half
customer_reviews.text: Spout that connects the pump and the bamboo rotted and broke after only a month and a half - of course right outside the window of return/replacement. Sad, because it was such a welcome addition to our zen garden.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Lucky to have it!
customer_reviews.text: I m so glad I purchased this fountain. Very portable so I can have it anywhere in my house and backyard. It’s specially pleasant to have it in my bedroom, helping me to fall asleep and sleeping through the night. Planning to get more as a present for my friends:)
customer_reviews.author: nelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Fountain Kit
customer_reviews.text: I had a beautiful ceramic flower pot that I had no idea what to do with, so I bought this fountain kit. It was simple to assemble and it sits right on top of the fountain. I added an LED submersible light, and wahlah, it's a gorgeous fountain for my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie 007

customer_reviews.title: Just a little ambiance.
customer_reviews.text: It adds a very ambiance to my small patio. When finding the bowl I brought the bamboo fountain part with me to make sure it fit. The rocks I found in my garden helped hold the pump down. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made fountain kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a previous fountain spout, and can't be happier about the purchase. It is better made than my previous one, and I like that it is available in a 12" size because it is a better size for my basin than the previous 18" version. Also, the plastic tubing is more easily replaced than my previous one because it attaches to a metal sleeve in the spout. The small included pump is perfectly sized, very quiet (I can only hear a faint low-pitched noise), and the cord is easily hidden. I definitely would order this again!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to hook up the tubing to the pump
customer_reviews.text: This is so simple and reasonably priced and can be used with any solid container. It's easy to hook up the tubing to the pump, then just put the pump in water and plug it in and voila, you have a lovely fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Reader-Writer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves this
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a diva. He will not drink water unless it is flowing water. I brought this because it was simple to set up and did not cost a lot. My cat loves it. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: Drkangel

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful, zen, serenity
customer_reviews.text: I have a planter without holes. I put this on top and added a few plants where I was camping. This made my site so peaceful.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Massas

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo fountain
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Plug & play, create a water sound inside your home. Go along with other decorations and in-house plants. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: MonikaMaddog

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is good quality and works great. We had so much fun finding things and building this!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Bought for my cats to play in/drink from. They are crazy about it!!
customer_reviews.author: BrendaZ

customer_reviews.title: Lovely until moldy, now trash
customer_reviews.text: The fountain was beautiful, worked well and made the sweetest sound on my counter, until I realized how MOLDY it had become. I read up on it and saw that I could have avoided that problem by adding bleach to the water every week. Well, it was too late to recover it so I threw the whole thing away. :( Please suggest that bleach be added to prevent mold. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Issues with tubing and metal connection
customer_reviews.text: I tried valiantly but was not able to keep the tubing attached to the bamboos section, the metal component in the bamboo section was not long enough to be able to fit the tubing around it so that it would stay. A very poor design. I had a very similar fountain kit in the past that was designed a bit differently and never had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Bowl not included....yes it does say that, but the picture is very deceiving! So for what you get...a tiny pump and some bamboo it is way overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca r

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little fountain
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and went together quickly. Pump worked great for 15 minutes and then quit working. Reached out to seller and they promptly sent a new one and it arrived in a few days. Everything is working great now. Thanks to the seller for their quick response. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl luneski

customer_reviews.title: Needed to repair it
customer_reviews.text: When I plugged it in water was leaking from both sides of the center piece. There was no sealing around where the fountain met the wood. I used hot glue to seal up the entire area. It now works as it should. I have it over a flower pot with goldfish in it outdoors. It's very attractive. I like that it will fit over different sized containers.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a small pot that I wanted to grow some lotus seeds in and this turned out to be perfect. It wasn't difficult to put together and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Moldy when left outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: The description advertises that this is great for outdoor patios, but after only a few weeks assembled, the "bamboo" has already grown moldy from the moisture. Only for use indoors. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: aco

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this fountain. It was simple to install and worked immediately. I've had it running continuously for several days now, and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well made product, rendered useless unless you change the battery. That makes the product not worth the money. The heart of a water fountain is the pump. I changed the battery and will keep it
customer_reviews.author: Ileana

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually leave reviews but I just thought I’d share how perfect this turned out
customer_reviews.author: Erica Lopez

customer_reviews.title: great fountain when the pump worked
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bamboo fountain kit & it was so wonderful hearing the water running, but it only worked for about 2 weeks & the pump stopped working. There's nothing like the calming sound of a fountain, so I'm hoping the seller will exchange mine for one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Teril

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I added it to a bowl with river rock and created my own fountain. I sealed the raw bamboo before I used it, and it has worked well. My dog does think it is his new water bowl, though.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my sun porch. Its adds an element of relaxation and looks lovely with all the plants.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pump.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little pump. My son made this one and put it in his room. With real fish in it. I really recommend this product it's inexpensive and works.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Great little fountain but missing a part
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the same model that lasted 5+ years. The pump died and the bamboo was pretty weathered. I have no complaints about the product itself but the new one arrived without the rubber tube. Glad I happened to have my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Koetke

customer_reviews.title: The pump didn't work after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Although I didn't turn my fountain on very often, the pump quit after 3 months. I liked the look and design of this bamboo fountain, but I was very dissatisfied that it worked for only a few months.
customer_reviews.author: c anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: It makes a lovely little trickling sound. I needed something more like Niagara Falls. Tiny pump, short hose.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Applied sealant
customer_reviews.text: Fountain looks good. I have heard many complaints about the bamboo cracking at some point so I decided to apply a waterproof wood sealant before using it. Will keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: Colibri

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent
customer_reviews.text: Great product to personalize your decor. I added rocks to stabilize, decorate and add weight to the fountain. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: K-35

customer_reviews.title: Getting a bowl would’ve made it worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: My bad for not realizing that this didn’t come with the bowl. That was really disappointing. I returned it without opening it because I didn’t think it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hisgirl71

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great and very easy to set up.. the pump was very small but still pumps the water thru
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Love it, easy to intall
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, love the sound of the flowing water. The only thing I would change or want different is the bump and bump cord, the black stands out quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: #Winning

customer_reviews.title: REQUIRES A PLUG
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, so, unless you are going Zen by an outlet, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Heart

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together! Simply adjusted pebbles I had to remove motor hum! Nice water trickling sound. So many ways to change up look! Perfect for my entryway. Can hear the peaceful sound from my living room!
customer_reviews.author: tms2

customer_reviews.title: No Go
customer_reviews.text: The tube was difficult to cut and bend and you don’t know how long you need it until it’s attached and then you cannot get it off. There is no trickling sound (which was the point). It stopped working numerous times and now I’m not using it. I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Little Black Dog Rescue

customer_reviews.title: My new fountain.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this. Plan on searching for the perfect bowl but for now am using this black one. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: JKJONE01

customer_reviews.title: I need a new one. This one was defective.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had put it together wrong because my brown kept running out of water. As I was looking on line for directions. I saw the reviews about the bamboo being broken and the water leaking. Sure enough, that’s it but I dnt know how to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 months. And I was sure to use distilled water so as not to clog it with any crap from the tap. I won’t buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S. Charnas

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to porch & Simple set up. Glad I purchased. Wanted water feature but didn’t want to spend Lots of money.
customer_reviews.author: April Ashmore

customer_reviews.title: Decent Little Fountain
customer_reviews.text: Our fourth such bamboo fountain (used for kitty water bowls), but they don't seem to last very long. Either the fountain starts leaking for no reason, or the straps holding the 2 bamboo pieces together rot away. Still, we keep buying them because of fondness for bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Nekkosan

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, arrived undamaged, looks great. For indoors or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin c

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: Combined it with another fountain. Sound is nice, louder if you increase distance and add rocks for splash. Motor not loud. It’s been running on my porch all summer and my dogs love their personal fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Simms

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and I love the little trickle of water sound. It’s very relaxing. The birds love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Starr Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing water sounds
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works perfectly. Gives a soft babbling brook sound.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: How creative one can get!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So cute and sound soothing. Placed rocks, plant and some fish. Too cool at night so now a fish rank indoors! Smile
customer_reviews.author: gilda villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great service
customer_reviews.text: My unit came with a defective water pump on arrival. A quick call to their support line had them express ship a replacement that arrived in about 2 days. The item itself looks great and makes for a real nice fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Elshenawy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect!!! Exactly what I was looking for.. overall so happy with it. Awesome for my balcony easy set up, perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: claudia polio

customer_reviews.title: Just like picture
customer_reviews.text: I think I could make cheaper since I have a yard full of bamboo but it was convenient and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Alison G.

customer_reviews.title: Some problems but not with the planter
customer_reviews.text: Having a problem finding a container to use with the water fountain (as shown in photo). Everything I find has a hole in it as with a planter.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Read the description
customer_reviews.text: My bad for not reading the entire description but thought it came with the green bowl. Not sure I would pay $40 for just a pump
customer_reviews.author: robert stickley

customer_reviews.title: Dead motor in two months and gunk is constant growing from the bamboo
customer_reviews.text: Dead motor in two months and gunk is constant growing from the bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy L

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks nice but did not come with hose for pump
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Zen Moment!
customer_reviews.text: This took five minutes to set up and was exactly as advertised. I would definitely recommend this product for a patio or indoor countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I have this outside my front door and it’s really beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Candice Heffron

customer_reviews.title: Makes a fantastic water feature
customer_reviews.text: This is a great 3-Arm spout and pump kit. I applied it to a beautiful Asian-style pot, and within minutes, my lovely new water feature was supplying a soothing ambience on my large covered porch. I put interesting stones in the bottom of the pot to hide the pump and plastic tube. I highly recommend this equipment for a simple, inexpensive water feature.
customer_reviews.author: Stradkat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Looks great, and the sound of the running water is absolutely perfect. I plan to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shakur

customer_reviews.title: Quick installation and peaceful
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it was for us to set this up and the peaceful sound it gives us outside. Our fish love it too ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: It was fun and easy to create my own fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience and creative potential of this product. Nice trickle sound too.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Mance

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Best little fountain ever! Motor is very quiet, and it works just as advertised. Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed
customer_reviews.text: The set up is easy but the flow hose is way too short. Also, the pump is way too weak.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE PALMER

customer_reviews.title: Pump is cheap worked only one time and stopped
customer_reviews.text: It only worked on the first day, second time I plugged it in the pump isn't working.
customer_reviews.author: Deann Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice added touch to small office space.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our daughter's office. Easy to set up and maintain. Makes a relaxing atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H

customer_reviews.title: Great buy quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted and having one in the past I know they last a long time..Delivery was fast.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the Three-Arm Spout
customer_reviews.text: No. I was disappointed that there was no tubing in the kit. Worse, it requires a tubing that is different sizes at each end, as each port is a different size. I wrote to the manufacturer, but never received a response, a solution, or even an apology. I won't order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Anne Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo fountain is good - pump is very small
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo fountain is good - pump is very small. I bought a bigger pump for it and it works great now.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 45 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on jun 25 2020 and working well till couple of weeks back and suddenly it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Archie19

customer_reviews.title: Pumped stopped soon after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 4 months ago. Pump stopped working and I even used filtered water. At 40$ that's $10 a month to use
customer_reviews.author: Lori Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.text: For $$$ paid assumed bowl was part of "kit"...more fool me 🤔🥵🤬...$40 for 3 chunks of bamboo & a $5 pump seems a bit much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo split after just 3 days and it causes the water to leak out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working in one year
customer_reviews.text: I use this fountain indoors and was happy until the pump broke after only a year, so I already have to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: marefire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fountain pump works well with my pot and will enjoy it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S

product_meta.title: Bamboo Accents Water Fountain for Yard, Indoor/Outdoor Fountain, 12” Wide Three-Arm Style Base, Smooth Split-Resistant Bamboo to Create Your Own Zen Fountain (Container Not Included)
feature_bullets: BUILD A MINIMALIST, SMOOTH-SOUNDING OASIS: Create a deep, resonant flow that soothes the senses with the sleek, low-lying 12”-wide design of the three-arm base. Perfect for an outdoor balcony or patio. Also goes well in your den or bedroom.

CUSTOMIZE THE LOOK: Turn a beautiful pottery bowl, planter, or ceramic pot into your own beautiful Zen fountain. You’ll soon be popular with neighborhood finches and hummingbirds – maybe even your cat will enjoy having a drink from your lovely creation.

ENJOY SOOTHING SOUNDS FOR YEARS TO COME: Spout is handcrafted from sleek, supple Tam Vong bamboo, which is stronger than steel by weight! This means it resists splitting or cracking better than other bamboo. It also absorbs excess noise, leaving only the relaxing sounds you want.

RELAX TO CALMING SOUNDS WITHIN MINUTES: Includes submersible pump, tubing, and bamboo fountain that you can set up in as little as 5 minutes on the edge of a 10” to 20” diameter container. Sized for containers as shallow as 4” deep, though a deeper pot means you can add plants or even small goldfish.
COMES WITH ELECTRIC PUMP: USA-standard 110-Volt pump that’s strong and quiet for its size. For European standard 220-Volt pumps, please purchase Amazon ASIN: B073SB7FPD.
